Surprise
It sounds like you’re having a lot of fun looking back at old memories! Who’s that in the picture with you?
Oh, that’s my best friend, Jane! We were inseparable back then. We used to do everything together, from playing sports to studying for exams. We had so many adventures together.
Surprise
It’s wonderful to have such a close friend. Have you kept in touch with her over the years?

Surprise
It’s always hard when you lose touch with someone who was once so important to you. Do you think you’d ever try to reconnect with her?

I’ve thought about it, but I’m not sure if she’d even remember me. It’s been so long, and we’ve both changed a lot since then. Plus, I heard from a mutual friend that she moved to a different country a few years ago.
Surprise
I can see why that would make it difficult. It’s still nice to look back on those memories and remember the good times you had together.

Yes, it definitely brings back a lot of happy memories. I’m grateful for the time we spent together. We had such a carefree childhood, without a lot of the worries and responsibilities that adults have. I miss those days sometimes.
Neutral
It’s natural to feel nostalgic for your childhood. But it’s also important to appreciate the present and the experiences that have shaped you into the person you are today.

Neutral
